item.title: DUMB Essay typer
item.dc:creator: @yohojo yohojo
item.description:
@yohojo wrote:

You had an extra begin
fixed it
and this wont type ever line ir onder…
it will just type random lines

try using a FOR TO DO loop like
[scar]i:=0
for I to 10 do
0: sendkeyssilent('and ');
1: sendkeyssilent('then ');
2: sendkeyssilent('I ');
3: sendkeyssilent('began to ');
4: sendkeyssilent('move ');
5: sendkeyssilent('ok… ');
6: sendkeyssilent('wow! ');
7: sendkeyssilent('so we went walking ok ');
8: sendkeyssilent(‘when I reached into the closet I’);
9: sendkeyssilent('went down the stairs to ');
10: sendkeyssilent('brandon then moved towards the hatchet and ');
end;[/scar]
somethign like that
i never learned for to do loops =) but that would make this work properly

program RandomTyper;
Const
waittime=100; // Time in between each typed letter. In milliseconds.

Procedure TypeRandom;
begin
Case Random(10) of
0: sendkeyssilent('and ');
1: sendkeyssilent('then ');
2: sendkeyssilent('I ');
3: sendkeyssilent('began to ');
4: sendkeyssilent('move ');
5: sendkeyssilent('ok… ');
6: sendkeyssilent('wow! ');
7: sendkeyssilent('so we went walking ok ');
8: sendkeyssilent(‘when I reached into the closet I’);
9: sendkeyssilent('went down the stairs to ');
10: sendkeyssilent('brandon then moved towards the hatchet and ');

end;
end;

Begin
repeat
TypeRandom;
wait(waittime);
until(isfkeydown(12));
End.

Read full topic

item.title: DUMB Essay typer
item.dc:creator: @aps aps
item.description:
@aps wrote:

This is very stupid, you can change anything you want in it, but the instructions are,
First: Open wordpad.
Second: Drag crosshairs onto wordpad.
Third: Click start.
thats it…
[size=25pt] REMEMBER!!! [/size]
NEVER EVER USE THIS TO REALLY WRITE AN ESSAY, IT WILL NOT WORK!!!

[scar] //______________\
//Wierd Essay Thing\
//--------APS--------\

program RandomTyper;
Const
waittime=100; // Time in between each typed letter. In milliseconds.

Procedure TypeRandom;
begin
begin
Case Random(10) of
0: sendkeyssilent('and ');
1: sendkeyssilent('then ');
2: sendkeyssilent('I ');
3: sendkeyssilent('began to ');
4: sendkeyssilent('move ');
5: sendkeyssilent('ok… ');
6: sendkeyssilent('wow! ');
7: sendkeyssilent('so we went walking ok ');
8: sendkeyssilent(‘when I reached into the closet I’);
9: sendkeyssilent('went down the stairs to ');
10: sendkeyssilent('brandon then moved towards the hatchet and ');

end;
end;
end;

Begin
repeat
TypeRandom;
wait(waittime);
until(isfkeydown(12));
End.[/scar]

PLEASE REPLY WHAT YOU THINK OF IT!!! :):):):)
